chart.search: sourcetype="django" host="$host$" | fillnull value="undefined" vendor_severity | eval severity=lower(vendor_severity) | timechart count(severity) as count by severity
chart.title: Messages by Severity (over time)

table.search: sourcetype="django" host="$host$" | fillnull value="undefined" vendor_severity | eval severity=lower(vendor_severity) | stats sparkline count by severity | sort -count
table.title: Messages by Severity

table.search: sourcetype="django" host="$host$" | stats sparkline count by module | sort -count
table.title: Messages by Logger Name

table.search: sourcetype="django" host="$host$" NOT (tag=database_query OR tag=database_change) | sort -_time | head 1000 | eval severity=lower(vendor_severity) | fillnull value="(undefined)" message | eval message=if(isnotnull(error_message),error_message,message)| table message severity
table.title: Most Recent Messages (Excluding SQL Logs)
